title: BGC's Gillis: Apple's Dependence on China is Concerning (Audio)
itunes:title: BGC's Gillis: Apple's Dependence on China is Concerning (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Colin Gillis, Director of Research and Senior Technology Analyst at BGC Financial, on Apple possibly having to halt iPhone sales in Beijing for patent infringement, and a look at Amazon's grocery business.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
